JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities    o Deliver specific allocated requirements as part of a wider deliverable, including detailed designs   o Focus on coding and unit testing of changes to the product, integration testing of related components   o Analyse and implement the requirements given to the team   o Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions   o Complete work items as part of a formal software development lifecycle   o Deliver software to high quality and within agreed timescales   o Mentor less experienced software engineers    Skills    o Required experience is 6-9 years of experience for this role   o Angular 8, SQL, HTML 5, WPF, Azure, Web development, C# .net Auth   o In-depth knowledge of C# and .NET   o Strong understanding of OOPs design, design patterns and programming skills   o Experience with third-party libraries and APIs   o Ability to perform in a team environment   o Excellent analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude   o Stay up to date with new technology trends
